node.title: Researcher refuses vaccines because he's had a dose of his own COVID-19 jab
node.alt: A man looking at a syringe
node.description: An Adelaide medical researcher who has developed and been administered with his own COVID-19 vaccine says he is facing the sack because of his refusal to get one of the TGA-approved jabs.
node.content:
["An Adelaide medical\u00a0researcher who has developed and administered his own COVID-19 vaccine\u00a0says he is facing the sack because of his refusal to get one of the TGA-approved jabs.", "Flinders Medical Centre\u00a0director of endocrinology Nikolai Petrovsky has developed a vaccine candidate,\u00a0COVAX-19,\u00a0which completed phase 1 trials in August\u00a0last year.", "The vaccine\u00a0was developed by Professor Petrovsky's company Vaxine, which has laboratories at adjacent Flinders University, and is based on a protein produced in insect cells.", "Professor Petrovsky said, after clinical phase two and phase three trials, it had been\u00a0\"approved for use in Iran and we're now looking to see if we can get it approved in Australia\".", "He said he had been administered with COVAX-19 and was disinclined to have any other dose.", "\"That could be very dangerous to do. There is no data on what would happen if you had a full course of one vaccine and then had another course of another kind of vaccine,\" he told ABC Radio Adelaide's David Bevan.\u00a0", "\"Normally you would have to do clinical trials to establish the safety of that approach.\"", "He\u00a0said he believed \"it would be a little unusual if we had someone else's vaccine rather than have the one we've developed ourselves\".", "As of yesterday, workers at all South Australian public and private hospitals have had to provide proof of at least one COVID-19 vaccine to continue working.\u00a0", "Professor Petrovsky said he was seeking an exemption, after receiving what he described as\u00a0a \"threatening\" letter from Flinders Medical Centre \u2014 which is co-located with the university's medical research labs.", "\"It says that as of yesterday all payments will be suspended and that my position itself will be considered to be made redundant if I don't submit to having one of their vaccines,\" he said.", "\"But obviously under the current mandates I don't qualify to be able to work. I'm waiting to hear whether SA Health will grant an exemption or whether I'm out of a job.\"", "", "
COVAX-19 was developed by Professor Petrovsky's company Vaxine, with work done at Flinders University.(Supplied)
", "Professor Petrovsky said he had received interest in his protein-based vaccine.", "In a statement, Flinders University \u2014 which has promoted Professor Petrovsky\u00a0throughout the pandemic \u2014\u00a0distanced itself from his work.", "\"Professor Petrovsky through his private company Vaxine has been developing a vaccine which is not currently approved for use in Australia,\" a spokeswoman said.", "\"We note that the TGA is giving ongoing consideration to its approved vaccine list.\"", "The spokeswoman said that, despite Professor Petrovsky's \"academic status with Flinders University, he is employed by SALHN. As such we cannot comment on questions of employment\".", "\"Flinders University is committed to following the requirements of health authorities and Emergency Management Directions in relation to COVID-19,\" the statement read.", "\"We note it is a requirement for anyone entering a hospital setting in SA to be fully vaccinated with a TGA-approved vaccine. We have advised our staff, affiliates, volunteers and contractors of this requirement.", "\"It follows that anyone not having received a TGA-approved vaccine is not able to enter health facilities, effective yesterday 1 November, unless they have a medical exemption.", "SA Health has been contacted for comment.", "", "
